official_title: To amend the Housing Act of 1949 to provide for private servicing of rural housing loans made under section 502 of such Act.
short_title: Rural Housing Loan Servicing Privatization Act

summary.text: Rural Housing Loan Servicing Privatization Act - Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to provide for private servicing of certain rural housing loans.

titles.title: Rural Housing Loan Servicing Privatization Act
To amend the Housing Act of 1949 to provide for private servicing of rural housing loans made under section 502 of such Act.
